Title: Akpabio removes Senator Natasha from diaspora, NGOs committee
Summary: Akpabio replaces Senator Natasha Akpoti-Uduaghan as Chairperson of the Senate Committee on Diaspora and Non-Government Organisations (NGOs) Senator Aniekan Bassey of Cross River State is her successor .

Title: Abiodun launches first Endoscopy machine in OOUTH
Summary: Mrs. Bamidele Abiodun launched the first Endoscopy machine at the Olabisi Onabanjo University Teaching Hospital (OOUTH), Sagamu, Ogun State . Initiated through her pet project, Ajose Foundation, the initiative marks a significant milestone .

Title: UNICEF employs new strategies for HPV vaccine acceptance in Osun
Summary: UNICEF has engaged and trained adolescent health promoters to advocate for increased acceptance of the HPV vaccine in Osun State . Concerned about the low uptake of the Human Papillomavirus (HPV) vaccine aimed at preventing cervical cancer .

Title: Ebonyi NSCDC busts adulterated fertiliser syndicates
Summary: Ebonyi NSCDC busts adulterated fertiliser syndicates . Operation Know Your Neighbour aimed at addressing illegal operations . The Nigeria Security and Civil Defence Corps (NSCDC) has launched the initiative .

Title: CKA Students Shine as National Microsoft Office Specialist Champions
Summary: Darasimi Adekunle emerged the National Champion in the Microsoft Office Specialist (MOS) PowerPoint Office 365 category . CKA Students Shine as National Microsoft Office Specialists Champions . With this remarkable achievement, CKA students shine as national champions .

Title: I was public enemy No. 1 under Jonathan – Shettima
Summary: VP Recounts Political Trials, Hails Adoke's Courage and Jonathan’s Respect for Rule of Law . Kashim Shettima described himself as ‘Public Enemy Number One’ in the final years of the former administration .

Title: APC excited over S’Court victory in Edo
Summary: The ruling All Progressives Congress APC welcomed Thursday's judgement of the Supreme Court affirming Senator Monday Okpebholo as the duly elected Governor of Edo state in the 2024 governorship election .

Title: EFCC ready to tackle virtual asset, crypto-related crimes — Olukoyede
Summary: Executive Chairman of the Economic and Financial Crimes Commission, Ola Olukoyede, reaffirmed the Commission’s readiness to combat crimes related to virtual assets and cryptocurrencies . The Commission's readiness comes amid a growing wave of online investment fraud and digital scams across Nigeria .

Title: Oshiomhole opposes PSC Institute bill, warns senate against rubber-stamping
Summary: As Senate Passes Bill to Establish Police Service Commission Training Institute . Chairman of the Senate Committee on Interior, Senator Adams Oshiomhole (APC, Edo North), has warned against what he described as the Senate’s growing tendency to serve as a ‘rubber stamp’

Title: Sokoto Obidients slam Kenneth Okonkwo, declare Peter Obi viable in North for 2027
Summary: Labour Party chieftain Kenneth Okonkwo claimed that only a northern candidate can unseat President Bola Tinubu in the 2027 general elections . Sokoto State chapter of the Obidient Movement strongly condemned recent remarks .
